name: PRIVATE STOCK - Shane Speal's ukulele (built by CBGitty)
description:
Cigar Box Ukulele (soprano size) built for Shane Speal by CBGitty.

Purchased by Shane and used in concert several times (most notably on his cover of Groucho Marx's "Lydia the Tattooed Lady.")  

Acoustic/electric with an internal contact mic pickup.

name: Electric Diddley Bow - Hobo art
description:
A tribute to the late, great One String Sam!

Shane Speal has created a new line of electric one-string diddley bows with a massive 30" scale and a bass pickup for the most bombastic primal boogie imaginable.

Each diddley is made from salvaged plywood, railroad spikes, salvaged bass pickups and a lot of mojo.  

Features Speal's "Hobo Art" with found-object beer caps decorating the top.

name: "The King" SUPREME Pro 4 string with exotic fretboard
description:
<iframe width="250" height="188" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/ZQd22iajIcU" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
"THE KING" THE TOP OF THE LINE CIGAR BOX GUITAR BY SHANE SPEAL.  This all-new cigar box guitar screams in electric fury.  It's solid and made for abuse on the road.  Take a close look at the pictures to see the details...

*  Loaded with a Silvertone style lipstick tube pickup.  
*  4-strings, tuned to open E for screaming lead playing.
*  Solid wood box, reinforced neck
*  Exotic hardwoods create a beautiful striped fretboard.  (Custom fretboard made by Mike Orr of Harrisburg, PA)
*  Other found-object parts round out the construction.

Each guitar comes with a tuning guide and link to free Youtube lessons.  These are signed by Shane Speal.

Only five of these models will be sold for the 2013 Holiday season  (and Shane is keeping the sixth one for himself!).  

Shipping:  $15 (US), $28 (CANADA), $39 (WORLDWIDE)

name: Truckstop Hobo 3-string license plate CBG - PRO ACOUSTIC PICKUP!
description:
SPECIAL!  This is a one-of-a-kind cigar box guitar, called the TRUCKSTOP HOBO...  3-string acoustic/electric cigar box guitar with old truck license plate top.  It's got the looks of a weary traveler with desperate songs from many towns.  Dripping pure mojo.

This is that one gift he'll never expect...and the best gift he receives.

*  3-string cigar box guitar in Shane Speal's classic "Catfish Style" setup.
*  Old truck license plate.  Gives the plugged in tone a touch of Dobro raspiness.
*  Woodburned frets on a poplar neck.
*  Found object bolts for nut and bridge.
*  Professional piezo rod pickup for amazing plugged-in sound and low feedback.  This one is a great live guitar.

One of a kind.  

Shipping:  $15 US
$29 Canada
$39 Worldwide

name: PRIVATE STOCK - Shane Speal's LOWEBOW - built by John Lowe, Memphis TN
description:
Of all the Private Stock instruments for sale, this one is the most mythical...  

This is the famed Lowebow ...double-neck ...cigar box guitar/bass hybrid by visionary musician, John Lowe of Memphis TN.  Lowe has made these instruments for primal blues icons, Richard Johnson, Ben Prestage and the North Mississippi Allstars.

This is the very first 27" scale length Lowebow ever built (documented and signed in Sharpie on the back of the box by John Lowe).

- 3 handwound pickups...2 for guitar and one for bass
- Bass and guitar necks are sent in TWO SEPARATE jacks so you can run it STEREO (!) into a bass amp and a guitar amp

Shane will also autograph this if the buyer requests.  Otherwise, it will be shipped exactly as he originally purchased it.

name: PRIVATE STOCK - Shane's Stick-Six cigar box guitar
description:
PRIVATE STOCK - SHANE SPEAL'S PERSONAL INSTRUMENTS

This is a concert-used cigar box guitar built and played by Shane Speal.  It features a unique shovel handle neck and six strings.  There is a Gibson style P90 pickup loaded in the cigar box.

Of all the guitars Speal performs with, this one usually gets the most attention due to it's insane looks.  However, it's easier to play than it appears. This is a slide guitar, pure and simple.  Fret lines are marked on the side of the neck, making it easy play.

This guitar has also been used in some of Speal's Youtube "How to Play CBG" lessons.

<iframe width="250" height="188" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/GmLWzeltZzU" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: PRIVATE STOCK - Shane Speal's personal 4-string.  (Seasick Steve style)
description:
PRIVATE STOCK - Concert used cigar box guitar built and played by Shane Speal.

This is a 4-string cigar box guitar/bass hybrid, utilizing one bass string and three guitar strings for a lush, full sound.  Speal built this using a handwound single-coil pickup by Skeesix and various found objects (door stop tailpiece, antique ruler fretboard, etc.).  

And the scrawled "I Hate Bluegrass" on the front...?  Shane did that one night after hearing endless bluegrass performers playing the same riffs.  Speal is a blues guy, pure and simple.  This was his declaration.  

<iframe width="250" height="188" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/2oBHbmXzrTo" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: PRIVATE STOCK - Shane Speal's cigar box diddley bow
description:
One of the most beautiful cigar box diddley bows built by Speal.  The instrument is notable in its simplicity:

- Antique trapezoid cigar box
- Antique yardstick fretboard
- Dowel rod bridge and nut

Speal has used this acoustic diddley bow in concert and in his popular "How to Play Cigar Box Guitar" video series.  

<iframe width="250" height="188" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/MxkHPfJQOFs" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: PRIVATE STOCK - Shane's personal "Chugger" 2-string
description:
Part of our Private Stock, this is Shane Speal's personal "Chugger" 2-string acoustic/electric cigar box guitar.   Built in May, 2012.

Speal's Chuggers have attained a mythical status among some cigar box guitarists due to the simplicity of 2-string setup, yet unlimited sonic possibilities.

Features:
-  Acid cigar box (all wood)
-  Antique yardstick fretboard
-  Internal contact mic pickup
-  Personal note of authenticity from Shane Speal

Shane has performed live in concert with this instrument.  Here is a video he produced back in 2012 with it:

<iframe width="250" height="188" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/T30_fF8AS1s" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: SHIRT - Shane Speal King of the Cigar Box Guitar
description:
All hail the King!  Shane's caricature as Henry VIII (drawn by fellow cigar box guitarist, Knotlenny) captured in a style reminiscent of the old Bozo the Clown t-shirts.

FREE SHANE SPEAL VINYL STICKER WITH EVERY SHIRT!

100% cotton white shirt with black screen print.  Limited sizes available.  Get 'em before they're gone.

name: SHIRT Shane Speal Snake Oil Band
description:
2013 tour shirts for Shane Speal's Snake Oil Band!!! 

Black all-cotton shirts with white screenprint.  FREE SHANE SPEAL VINYL STICKER WITH EVERY SHIRT

Show off your favorite hard rock jug band!

name: SHIRT - Shane Speal HAND STENCILED shirt
description:
We have just a couple of these rare hand-stenciled shirts by Shane Speal.  A small run was created for the kickstart  of his album, Empty Wooden Box.  

Created and hand stenciled by Shane Speal.  90/10 cotton/poly blend gray shirt with black ink.  Signed by Shane Speal

Each shirt comes with a free Shane Speal vinyl sticker.

name: CD Empty Wooden Box - the instrumental cigar box guitar album
description:
Shane Speal's newest album for 2013!  This is a collection of stark, meditative instrumentals on cigar box guitar.  Speal recorded it to show the full artistry and depth of the instrument.

1.  And the Moon Escaped at Dawn
2.  Cart of the Peddler Woman
3.  How Great Thou Art
4.  Late Autumn Longshadow
5.  Maypole Hill
6.  Pocketful of Tickets
7.  Presbyterian Lullaby 
8.  Raga Nova
9.  When Johnny Comes Marching Home

name: CD - Shane Speal - "12 STONES"
description:
The latest release by the King of the Cigar Box Guitar. 

"A Shane Speal album is always a welcome release and Twelve Stones is no exception.Speals seemingly bottomless enthusiasm is in abundance throughout, as is his energy and willingness to mix things up and experiment with different styles.The result is that the listener has, quite simply, a Good Time and this, one suspects,is Speals aim.Get together,have a good time.A worthy intention in these increasingly alienated,troubled times.Pick up 12 Stones today." - Hollowbelly

Recorded live in the studio. 

Features "Mother Leeds," Speal's murder ballad about the Jersey Devil and "Tattoo of You." 

MOTHER LEEDS 
KILL A MAN 
TATTOO OF YOU  
SLOW MOTION (CROW VERSION) 
COAL BLACK MATTIE 
DON'T LET ME GET RICH 
WILLIE KNOWS
16 MILES TO SALTSBURG
OL' JOHN PETERSON
IN MY TIME OF DYING 
WORKING MAN (Rush cover)
THE RAINBOW CONNECTION

name: CD  Shane Speal - "Shane Speal"
description:
The loud and primal self-titled cd from the King of the Cigar Box Guitar.  Nine gloriously lo-fi tracks including Speal's remake of Jimi Hendrix's "I Dont Live Today" performed on cigar box guitar and backed by a fife-and-drum band.  

1. Red Letter
2. Billy Pringle (a song about a pig)
3. Dead Heroes Sell
4. God
5. Tunnel Rat
6. Drive She Said
7. I Don't Live Today
8. Hit the Wine
9. Line 'Em Up

name: CD Jug Fusion:  "Box Set"
description:
"...an amazing construction of blues, rock, surf, and the kitchen sink– er, washtub. It has also been one of the most exciting albums I’ve heard in a long time."  -Dave X in STARTLING MONIKER.

This is the cd that started the Cigar Box Guitar Revolution.

Shane Speal's original "band" release (he performed 85% of the instruments) that enthroned him as the King of the Cigar Box Guitar.  Featuring many cigar box guitars, plastic bucket drums, blown amplifiers and many more homemade creations are used to create a post-modern blues rock album. Best described as the "the music from the fight scene in 'Blind Willie Johnson Vs. Godzilla." Brutal mutant rock at times, deep scratchy Delta blues elsewhere.  

Probably the greatest Insurrection Records release...  You decide.

Track Listing:
1. Sittin' on the front porch with a cigar box guitar
2. Jesus is Comin' Soon.
3. Slow Motion
4. Jesus, Make up my Dyin' Bed
5. Bone to Pick/ Miserlou
6. Love in Vain
7. X-Ray Spex
8. These Frustrating Blues
9. Relaxing Music for Plucking a Chicken
10. Take It Slow (Fall in Love)
11. Can't Get You Outta My Mind
12. Fightin' with the Catfish
13. Good Morning Blues
14. Diddy Wa Diddy (dedicated to Hound Dog Taylor.)
15. Spiritual: Dark Was The Night/ Amazing Grace
16. Hymn 151: Breakfast with God
17. You Gotta Move
18. (contact)
19. I Wanna Go Home

name: CD - Shane Speal "Stealing the Fire"
description: It could be a modern incarnation of the old blues scenario: A man sits in his single-wide mobile home with a primitive guitar & belts out mean murder ballads & dark spirituals through a rusty harmonica mic. But it's not a "scenario." This is the real deal. Speal was living in the middle of a Pennsylvania trailer park. He plays a cigar box guitar. And he recorded this album on a simple 4-track cassette recorder. Stealing the Fire features stark homemade recordings of Speal performing the works of Timothy Renner on a primitive cigar box guitar. It was a simple premise in the beginning. Speal just wanted to know what Renner's dark folk music would sound like if were soaked in Delta blues. Speal covers Renner's work from Stone Breath, Spectral Light & Moonshine Firefly Jamboree & solo recordings.

description:
Handmade beer cap necklace by Shane Speal.  Features an antique picture of Mickey Mouse rocking a cigar box fiddle!

+  Crafted from old beer bottle caps.
+  Artwork embossed inside cap
+  30 inch chain

* beer cap brand may differ from photo

description: Shane Speal vinyl sticker with artwork by Christoph Mueller.   It's nice and big (6 inches x 4 inches) and perfect for your car, guitar case or plastered all over the city.    Indoor/outdoor (won't get ruined by the rain).

description:
Ah, the flying rubber chicken...it's become the official mascot of Shane Speal's Snake Oil Band.  Now you can proudly display your allegiance to the "King's" court.

+  Crafted from old beer bottle caps.

name: BOOK - An Obsession with Cigar Box Guitars by David Sutton
description:
FEATURES MANY OF SHANE SPEAL'S INSTRUMENTS + AN EXTENSIVE INTERVIEW.  We only have three copies of this book in stock.  Each one personally autographed by Shane.

There’s growing movement of self-expression unfolding in the world of music. Musicians and hobbyists are finding new creative freedom by making their own musical instruments out of unconventional materials. In a modern revival of a great American tradition, sliders, pickers, strummers and makers are coming together in what they call the cigar box guitar revolution. An Obsession with Cigar Box Guitars celebrates the modern craft of their irresistibly alluring instruments.

Professional photographer and woodworking enthusiast David Sutton first chronicled the modern revival of the cigar box guitar in his best-selling book, Cigar Box Guitars. Now he’s back to share his obsession with these handmade treasures in an amazing photo gallery that profiles 120 inspiring examples of homemade musical greatness. In a testament to human creativity, these guitars range from simple, cardboard diddley bow-type instruments to wooden box electric six-string models that are more impressive than anything you can buy in a store.

name: "Octavia Olivia" octave Chugger 3-string
description:
This simple, yet beautiful instrument takes my "Chugger" idea (two string cigar box guitar in power chord) and adds a doubled string on the root note.  I think it sounds amazing.  It's in the tenor guitar range and has a bit of mandolin sound to it.

I created this on a whim, as I sometimes do when I see scraps and forgotten parts laying around the shop.  The neck was from an abandoned project from last summer.  The oak fretboard a leftover from another series of instruments.  

Topping it all off is the gorgeous yellow box with beautiful artwork.  The guitar is wired up for an acoustic/electric performance.  

Demo video:
<iframe width="250" height="188" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/-eZRmdFGCAg" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: "The Healer" 3-string cigar box guitar
description:
FULL BODIED TONE, THROATY MIDS AND LOUD VOLUME ON THIS CIGAR BOX GUITAR!  The all wood Tabak box is one of the best tonal cigar boxes out there today.

This is the classic Shane Speal design he first developed in the mid-1990's. It's a blues-approved, 3 string slide cigar box guitar that drips more mojo than a voodoo spell.

Featuring:
- Woodburned frets
- Internal contact mic pickup (yes, it's acoustic/electric!)
- 23" scale based on an antique Stella guitar
- All wood cigar box with great Tabak box
- Hand woodburned signature by Shane Speal

Shipping:
$15 US
$28 Canada
$39 Worldwide

name: "Bourbon" 3-string electric cigar box guitar
description:
Like a late-night class of a good bourbon on the rocks...  

3-string, electric cigar box guitar by Shane Speal with a single coil pickup in the neck position.  SILKY, BLUESY TONES come from this machine.   Plug it into an old tube amp and push it to the limit.

Features:
-  Classic Shane Speal 3-string design
-  Single coil pickup hardwired straight to jack
-  Antique yardstick fretboard (Frets are marked on the side)
-  23" scale based on an antique Stella guitar
-  All wood cigar box with brass corners
-  access to rear controls.  Another cigar box serves as rear control panel cover

Shipping:
$15 US
$28 Canada
$39 Worldwide

name: PICCOLO Cigar Box Guitar - 1/2 scale, Mandolin/Uke range
description:
This is something completely different...and beautiful sounding.

Shane has built a series of 1/2 scale cigar box guitars that have the tones of a mandolin or ukulele, yet retains the attitude and character of a 3-string slide cigar box guitar.  

This is perfect for someone who wants a totally unique, soprano tone in a recording or for old time string band playing.  Children will find it a fun instrument as well.

* All wood Tabak Special box
* Hand-cut sound holes (Renaissance style C-shape)
* Poplar neck with stained oak fretboard
* Tuned FCF (open F)
* 100% Acoustic (no internal pickup)

<iframe width="250" height="188" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/JkMubwdm6mM" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
